revised_title: Mineral Chemistry and Genetic Relations Among H-Group Chondrites
tldr: The study investigates the mineral chemistry and genetic relations among H-group chondrites, a type of meteorite. The research focuses on ten H-group chondrites and examines their mineral compositions, crystal-liquid equilibria, and post-accretion crystallization. The findings suggest that the mineral chemistry of these meteorites is primarily the result of crystal-liquid equilibria during chondrule solidification and accretion, with the degree of post-accretion crystallization being a function of the rate of cooling.
